p: Rosin maleimidodicarboxylic acid diglycidyl ether is a yellowish solid. It can be prepared from epichlorohydrin and dicarboxylic derivative of maleimide (described in more detail in Section 3.2.3) according to Scheme 9 prior to filtration, washing, drying and rotary evaporation [ 84]. It shows higher glass transition temperature, modulus and thermal stability than its plant oil counterparts [ 84].
